participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and determined, Emily is focused on her goals and enjoys engaging in lighthearted conversations.
participant_1.background: I am currently in high school. When I grow up I want to be a physical therapist. I make straight As in school. My current goal is to run a 5K. I won homecoming queen this year.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Jordan enjoys socializing and is always looking for opportunities to connect with others.
participant_2.background: My mother is a dentist. I am currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. I like playing basketball. My favourite artist is Travis Scott. I have one older sister.

content.text: I'm a high school student and I'm going to major in physical therapy when I go to college.
Oh, that's great! I'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant.
What's your favorite artist?
Travis Scott.
I've heard of him, but I've never listened to his music.
You should! He's really good.
Maybe I will.
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to play basketball.
Me too! I used to play on my high school team.
I'm not very good, but I have fun.
That's all that matters.
I guess so.
Have you heard of the restaurant "The Cheesecake Factory"?
Yes, I have. It's a pretty popular chain.
I've been wanting to try it.
It's pretty good. I've been there a few times.
I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's really good.
Thanks for the recommendation.
